attributes.action: A referendum on the recognition of a Palestinian State?
attributes.additional_details: Personally, the government does not have a mandate to make this decision and I suspect that this is policy  would not be accepted by the majority of the electorate if it was put to a referendum.
attributes.background: I did not vote for this and this was unilaterally decided by the Government without  seeking consent from the electorate.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Hold a referendum on recognition of a Palestinian State" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/742547
